<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/nodes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new node on the Panel. Returns the created node and an HTTP/201
status response on success.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
